subject: Football
Stadiums and Arenas
Athletics and Sports
organizations: New Jersey Sports and Exposition Authority
lead_paragraph: A number of short-term measures are being weighed to help stop the ritual of harassment that has been taking place at Gate D of Giants Stadium during halftime of Jets games.
